Vehicle.Name: Multi Troop Transport
Vehicle.Description: [H3]Multi Troop Transport[h3] Please see page 68 of the Rise of the Separatists Sourcebook for details.

Mod.MiscDesc: [B]Droid Deployment[b]: As a maneuver, a crew member can begin deployment of the MTT's complement of battle droid, which will be deployed and actrive at the end of the following round.

[B]Ram Prow[b]: An MTT traveling at top speed may ram a stationary target of silhouette 2 or greater by ussing a maneuver to engate it. If the target is mobile, this instead requires an action and a [B]Hard ([DI][DI][DI]) Piloting (Planetary) check[b]. Use collision rules to determine the effects of a collision. Add +20 to any Critical Hit rolls the MTT inflicts on its target.

Vehicle.Crew: One pilot, one co-pilot/gunner/engineer, one deployment rack operator, one vehicle commander
